title: Videos stall issues
content: When I play a video no matter what site I'm on or what app I'm using all videos keep stalling while playing in the middle of me watching a video I will see  the freeze frame from before I clicked on the video in a 60 second video I will see the freeze frame at least three times also as I am typing this now my keyboard keeps disappearing in the middle of me writing this up I've had my Google pixel for 2 years and never had this issue until the last recent update
